approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: To create a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency in accessing and managing V-KYC recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient, especially during audits. This project aims to streamline the process.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created to provide access to V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to V-KYC team leads and process managers.
The portal should allow users to search for recordings by LAN ID.
Recordings should be searchable by date and month.
The system should allow bulk download of recordings based on a list of LAN IDs provided in a CSV/TXT file (up to 50 LAN IDs).
The bulk download should display results in a table with pagination (10 records per page).
The system should download a maximum of 10 records at a time during bulk download.
The recording download should start upon clicking the LAN ID.
The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: User authentication and authorization for accessing the portal.
Search functionality for V-KYC recordings by LAN ID.
Search functionality for V-KYC recordings by date and month.
Bulk download functionality based on uploaded file (CSV/TXT).
Display of search results in a tabular format with pagination.
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible only to authorized users (Team Leads).
The system should be able to handle a maximum of 50 LAN IDs in a bulk download request.
success_criteria: Easy access to V-KYC recordings for authorized users.
Reduction in time taken to retrieve recordings.
Increased efficiency in the audit process.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
The system should handle a maximum of 50 LAN IDs in a bulk download request.
File upload will be csv/txt file.
assumptions: The necessary infrastructure and network connectivity are available.
The IT team will provide the required access to the NFS server.
The format of the V-KYC recordings is consistent.
risks: Technical challenges in accessing and retrieving recordings from the NFS server.
Security risks related to unauthorized access to recordings.
Performance issues due to large data volume.

recommendations: Include details about error handling and user feedback mechanisms.
Specify the security measures to be implemented.

identified_gaps: Detailed specifications for user interface design.
Specific security requirements and access control mechanisms.
Performance requirements (e.g., response time for searches and downloads).
recommendations_for_completion: Define security protocols and access control mechanisms.
Conduct performance testing to ensure system responsiveness.
